sentences.sContent: In the space of all possible lifes, life on Earth is but a tiny sliver -- one attempt at creativity.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the space of all possible lifes, life on Earth is but a tiny sliver -- one attempt at creativity.
sentences.sCn: 在所有可能有生命存在的空间里，地球上孕育的生命只占那么一小条――创造性的一次努力。

remMethod.val: 注意不要和silver(n. 银)相混
